text: int main ( ) { long long int t , a [ 100001 ] , n , s , i ; scanf ( "%lld" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & n ) ; scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ 0 ] ) ; s = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] > a [ i - 1 ] ) { s = s + a [ i - 1 ] ; a [ i ] = a [ i - 1 ] ; } else s = s + a [ i ] ; } if ( s == 0 ) printf ( "%lld\n" , a [ 0 ] ) ; else printf ( "%lld\n" , s ) ; } }
